column1: Little Goat Diner////If I had to choose two cons of this place
column2: they would be 1. that they ran out of the shrimp and grits
column3: and 2. (and this is super super nit picky)
column4: the table we sat at was in the light from the sunroof and there was a glare on me the whole time and I was sooo hot from the sun
column5: even though it was freezing out. I was at the ONE table this impacted so really it's not a big deal.
